response.overview: If Rozlyn Khan's Savita Bhabhi was not enough to spread your drools, then here is a freshly brewed offer webbing up through some more sex and Kamasutra with Playboy girl Shanti Dynamite! Yes, yes, yes! The same chic who had made you go gaga with her nude curves and aah, those seductions! So coming back to reports, we hear that controversial filmmaker Rupesh Paul, who is again a frequent visitor into wrong stuff, is believed to have roped in Shanti for his upcoming next gangster erotica film! Yes! Now isn't that hawwttt?  In fact, the infamous Playboy girl Shanti Dynamite is all set to enter the Hindi film industry as 'Savita Barbie' with Kamasutra 3D filmmaker Rupesh Paul's next.  Whoa.... which means we have a whole new sensation coming up... aaah! But we wonder who will titillate you more, Rozlyn Khan as Savita Bhabhi or Shanti Dynamite as Savita Barbie? Well, we can't wait for steamy oozes of both the sexy sirens!
response.title: Savita Barbie
